remarks: Express the limit operator for a function defined by a mapping. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2016.)
statement:
limcmpt2.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ CC ) $.
limcmpt2.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. A ) $.
limcmpt2.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( z e. A /\ z =/= B ) ) -> D e. CC ) $.
limcmpt2.j $e |- J = ( K |`t A ) $.
limcmpt2.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
limcmpt2 $p |- ( ph -> ( C e. ( ( z e. ( A \ { B } ) |-> D ) limCC B ) <-> ( z e. A |-> if ( z = B , C , D ) ) e. ( ( J CnP K ) ` B ) ) ) $.
$d A z $.
$d B z $.
$d C z $.
$d ph z $.
